title: Dead By Daylight v1.0.6 Repack +Lanfix and Online
description:
Games Launch: 
For Steam-Fix: 
1. Run Steam , go to your profile. 
2. Start the game via the Launcher.exe, which is in the game folder. 
It is strongly recommended to read the Activation of Steam-Fix before using it. 

For LAN-Fix: 
1. If you are in Online & LAN-Fix any problems with the connection, run the LAN simulator and go in any or private network. 
2. Run the game through SSELauncher.exe, which is in the game folder. 

In Game: 
Connection: 
Become a survivor -> Login to the lobby -> expected to connect to the server -> Let's play! 

Creating a server: 
Become a murderer -> New lobby -> We expect players to connect and start the game -> Play!
